markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Restricted"
>
[Shared Dream](/Feats.aspx?ID=3881) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 207</row>

**Archetype** [Sleepwalker](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=195)

**Prerequisites**
[Sleepwalker Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3873)

</column>

---

You've learned to create a shared dreamscape to communicate with others. You can cast [_dream council_](/Spells.aspx?ID=89) as an innate occult spell.
name: Shared Dream
